content.rendered: Tanveer has always enjoyed working with students and supporting them in their journey to achieve their qualifications. The pandemic has given a new meaning to the word – Digital – Which is why supporting students in every way possible is important now more than ever. Tanvir tries my best to ensure that she am able to support our students to reach the end goal of their education – which is character!
